error.message: Parameter $event of method Drupal\hidden_language\EventSubscriber\HiddenLanguageSubscriber::onKernelRequestCheckLanguageAccess() has typehint with deprecated class Symfony\Component\HttpKernel\Event\GetResponseEvent: since Symfony 4.3, use RequestEvent instead
Value of core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 is not compatible with the next major version of Drupal core. See https://drupal.org/node/3070687.
